iramat.dosiedit2d.controler

Class GlobalControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • iramat.dosiedit2d.controler.GlobalControler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GlobalControler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The global controller of the project. It handles project action, like saving, loading, quitting, generating pilot text file... And global informations in the model.
    Author:
    alan
    See Also:
    ActionListener

        public void fillLayer(iramat.dosiseed.model.ColoredMaterial currentMaterial,
                      boolean justEmpty)
        Fill layer with the current material.
        Parameters:
        justEmpty - if true, only empty voxels will be filled. If false, all voxels will be.

      • setCurrentRadValue

        public void setCurrentRadValue(iramat.dosiseed.model.ColoredMaterial currentMaterial,
                               float u,
                               float th,
                               float k,
                               float ud)
        Set the current radiation value to the current material.
        Parameters:
        currentMaterial - the material to update.
        u - the new uranium value.
        th - the new thorium value.
        k - the new potassium value.
        ud - the new user-defined radiation value.

      • setRefRadValue

        public void setRefRadValue(iramat.dosiseed.model.ColoredMaterial currentMaterial,
                           float u,
                           float th,
                           float k,
                           float ud)
        Set the reference radiation value to the current material.
        Parameters:
        currentMaterial - the material to update.
        u - the new reference value for uranium.
        th - the new reference value for thorium.
        k - the new reference value for potassium.
        ud - the new reference value for user-defined value.

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                      java.util.ArrayList<util.Couple<iramat.dosiseed.model.Material,java.lang.Integer>> associations)
        Load a gray shade image text file into the object. Each pixel become a voxel.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to load.
        associations - a list of couple which handles associations between gray shade value in the image and material.
        See Also:
        Dosi2DModel.loadImage(BufferedImage, ArrayList)
